task.title: How to install a FieldWorks application

prerequisites.p: Before you can install a FieldWorks application, you will need to:

ul.li: Download the FieldWorks application from the SIL Intranet.

steps.p: Here are the steps to install a FieldWorks application:
steps.step: Double click the "setup.exe" file you downloaded. It is a self-extracting compressed file.

Let the installation program lead you through the installation. You will need to choose a location for the program.
A subfolder of the "Program Files" system folder is recommended, the installation program will create it for you.

If this is the first time you have installed a FieldWorks application, install the MSDE server software if prompted (this may install automatically). Most FieldWorks software requires it. Presently, WorldPad does not.
To launch the FieldWorks application, double click the application icon that the installation program put on your desktop.
